text:
@RahulGandhi #FreeDrKafeel 
#ReleaseDrKafeelKhan
#SaveDemocracy 
#MedicalServiceCentre

We request President of India his active and immediate intervention to save a most humanist doctor of the nation, Dr Kafeel Khan, unconditionally, to serve the nation in times of COVID-19 pandemic.
